name: searchFlightsOptimized
description: Search for flights between airports with lounge access optimization, ranking results by lounge availability and access opportunities for the user's memberships.

origin.description: Three-letter IATA airport code for departure (e.g., JFK)

destination.description: Three-letter IATA airport code for arrival (e.g., LAX)

user_id.description: User ID to check lounge access eligibility

return_date.description: Optional return date for round-trip flights in YYYY-MM-DD format

optimize_for.description: Optimization priority: lounge_access (maximize lounge opportunities), price (best value), or convenience (shortest travel time)
